game.name: PAYDAY 2 VR
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, VR Supported, Steam Trading Cards, VR Support, SteamVR Collectibles, In-App Purchases, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Step into the world of a heister! PAYDAY 2 VR is the full PAYDAY 2 experience, where you really get a sense of every cop, dozer, cloaker and medic closing in on you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the world of a heister! PAYDAY 2 VR is the full PAYDAY 2 experience, where you really get a sense of every cop, dozer, cloaker and medic closing in on you.
